name: @otto-ec/ottoapi-guidelines
description: This repository is the source for establishing a uniform API standard (aka API Guidelines), which serves as a set of rules for the creation of new APIs within MA-EC. (In the future, this standard can also be used to unify existing APIs.) The [API Manifesto](/manifesto.md) helps to establish this standard and comprises values that a work group has agreed upon in advance.

scripts.build:collect: FORCE_COLOR=true DEBUG_COLORS=true DEBUG_DEPTH=6 DEBUG_LEVEL=debug DEBUG=collect:* npm run collect
scripts.dev: npm run build:clean && concurrently "npm run watch:model" "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:render"
scripts.dev:docker: concurrently "npm run watch:model -- -L" "npm run watch:render -- -L" "npm run serve"
scripts.deploy: tb s3 upload && tb cloudfront invalidate
scripts.lint: (for S in src docs; do npm run lint:$S; [ $? -ne 0 ] && exit 1; done; exit 0;)
scripts.watch:css: nodemon --config config/nodemon.css.json -x 'npm run build:css && npm run build:images'
scripts.packlocal: export PKGNAME=ottoapi-guidelines; mkdir -p ./tmp && rm -rf ./tmp/*-$PKGNAME-*.tgz; rm -rf ./tmp/package; npm pack && mv -f *-$PKGNAME-*.tgz ./tmp/ && tar xfz ./tmp/*-$PKGNAME-*.tgz -C ./tmp
